main.name: Sudip Karmacharya
main.description: I am graduating in the spring 2021. I am excited about what next there is to learn and experience.
main.bio: I am a mechanical engineer focusing on mechanical design, prototype fabrication, CAD modeling, Finite Element Analysis, and automation. I am passionate about designing and building interdisciplinary engineering solutions in a hands-on environment. I live by the ideas of self improvement in every facet of my life. My determination for excellence is complemented by a sense of humility to stay focused on my goals and learning.

education.description: Numberical Control of Machine Tools, Finite Element Methods, Autonomous Mobile Robots, Non-metallic and Composite Materials, Computer-Aided Design, Robot Manipulators: Kinematics, Dynamics, Control, Advanced Dynamics and Vibrations, Manufacturing Processes, Intorduction to Control Systems, Heat Transfer 1, Fluid Mechanics 1 & 2, Thermodynamics 1 & 2, Kinematics and Dynamics of Machines

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
